sentence in indonesian using the words: Serangga ini sangat kecil.
english translation: "These insects are very small."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ikan hiu itu sangat besar.
english translation: "That shark is very big."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ikan paus itu hidup di laut biru.
english translation: "The whale lives in the blue sea."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Windu pertama dimulai pada tahun 100 sampai 199.
english translation: "The first century started from the year 100 to 199."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dekade ini adalah periode sepuluh tahun.
english translation: "This decade is a period of ten years."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Abad ke-20 adalah abad terakhir.
english translation: "The 20th century is the last century."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Awal pagi diisi dengan semangat baru.
english translation: "Early morning is filled with fresh spirits."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tahun pertengahan adalah saat setengah perjalanan.
english translation: "Mid-year is halfway through the journey."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Daun-daun gugur di musim gugur.
english translation: "Leaves fall in autumn."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bunga semi memiliki keindahan unik.
english translation: "Semi flowers have a unique beauty."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Generasi muda adalah masa depan negara.
english translation: "The younger generation is the future of the nation."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dahulu, kota ini diperintah oleh raja.
english translation: "Formerly, this city was ruled by a king."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sekarang jam delapan di pagi hari.
english translation: "It's currently eight o'clock in the morning."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia tiba di pesta jam delapan lewat seperempat.
english translation: "She arrived at the party a quarter past eight."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kereta tersebut akan berangkat jam delapan lebih seperempat.
english translation: "The train will depart a quarter to eight."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mereka akan berkumpul pukul setengah sembilan.
english translation: "They will gather at half past eight."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ayo pergi sebelum jam sembilan kurang seperempat.
english translation: "Let's go before a quarter to nine."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pertemuan akan dimulai pukul sembilan.
english translation: "The meeting will start at nine o'clock."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Acara tersebut dimulai pukul sembilan.
english translation: "The event will start at nine o'clock."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Umumnya, hujan di musim penghujan.
english translation: "Generally, it rains during the rainy season."
